[source, python]

resp = client.search(
    index="kibana_sample_data_ecommerce",
    size=0,
    aggs={
        "daily_sales": {
            "date_histogram": {
                "field": "order_date",
                "calendar_interval": "day",
                "format": "yyyy-MM-dd"
            },
            "aggs": {
                "revenue": {
                    "sum": {
                        "field": "taxful_total_price"
                    }
                },
                "unique_customers": {
                    "cardinality": {
                        "field": "customer_id"
                    }
                },
                "avg_basket_size": {
                    "avg": {
                        "field": "total_quantity"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
